member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_CONTROL_FLAGS
member.summary: Defines constants that specify shader cache control options.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_CONTROL_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_CONTROL_FLAG_DISABLE
member.summary: Specifies that the cache shouldn't be used to look up data, and shouldn't have new data stored in it. Attempts to use/create a cache while it's disabled result in DXGI_ERROR_NOT_CURRENTLY_AVAILABLE.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_CONTROL_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_CONTROL_FLAG_ENABLE
member.summary: Specfies that use of the cache should be resumed.

member.name: D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_CONTROL_FLAGS.D3D12_SHADER_CACHE_CONTROL_FLAG_CLEAR
member.summary: Specfies that any existing contents of the cache should be deleted.
